extension.category: Detects incorrect or questionable semantic constructs for elements in a PolicyLib diagram.
Detects PolicyLib elements that would result in invalid generated OpenDDS code.
Detects QoS Policy members that would result in invalid generated OpenDDS code.

constraints.constraint: not self.name.oclIsUndefined() and self.name <> '' Policy names should not be empty Policy name is empty

self.max_samples = -1 or self.max_samples > 0
dsQosPolicy max_samples must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero dsQosPolicy max_samples must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.max_instances = -1 or self.max_instances > 0
dsQosPolicy max_instances must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero dsQosPolicy max_instances must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.max_samples_per_instance = -1 or self.max_samples_per_instance > 0
dsQosPolicy max_samples_per_instance must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero dsQosPolicy max_samples_per_instance must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.history_depth = -1 or self.history_depth > 0
dsQosPolicy history_depth must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero dsQosPolicy history_depth must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.max_samples = -1 or self.max_samples > 0
rlQosPolicy max_samples must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero rlQosPolicy max_samples must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.max_instances = -1 or self.max_instances > 0
rlQosPolicy max_instances must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero rlQosPolicy max_instances must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.max_samples_per_instance = -1 or self.max_samples_per_instance > 0
rlQosPolicy max_samples_per_instance must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero rlQosPolicy max_samples_per_instance must be -1 (LENGTH_UNLIMITED) or greater than zero

self.period.second >= 0 and ( self.period.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.period.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) deadlineQosPolicy period second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec deadlineQosPolicy period second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.service_cleanup_delay.second >= 0 and ( self.service_cleanup_delay.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.service_cleanup_delay.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) dsQosPolicy service_cleanup_delay second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec dsQosPolicy service_cleanup_delay second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.duration.second >= 0 and ( self.duration.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.duration.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) lbQosPolicy duration second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec lbQosPolicy duration second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.duration.second >= 0 and ( self.duration.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.duration.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) lifespanQosPolicy duration second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec lifespanQosPolicy duration second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.lease_duration.second >= 0 and ( self.lease_duration.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.lease_duration.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) livelinessQosPolicy lease_duration second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec livelinessQosPolicy lease_duration second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.autopurge_disposed_samples_delay.second >= 0 and ( self.autopurge_disposed_samples_delay.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.autopurge_disposed_samples_delay.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) rdlQosPolicy autopurge_disposed_samples_delay second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec rdlQosPolicy autopurge_disposed_samples_delay second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.autopurge_nowriter_samples_delay.second >= 0 and ( self.autopurge_nowriter_samples_delay.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.autopurge_nowriter_samples_delay.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) rdlQosPolicy autopurge_nowriter_samples_delay second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec rdlQosPolicy autopurge_nowriter_samples_delay second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.max_blocking_time.second >= 0 and ( self.max_blocking_time.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.max_blocking_time.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) reliabilityQosPolicy max_blocking_time second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec reliabilityQosPolicy max_blocking_time second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec

self.minimum_separation.second >= 0 and ( self.minimum_separation.nanosecond < 1000000000 or self.minimum_separation.nanosecond = 2147483647 ) tbfQosPolicy minimum_separation second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec tbfQosPolicy minimum_separation second must be non-negative and nanosecond < 1 sec
